s_synopsis: Princess Lurana has been abducted by the evil Sheikh Sazabiss to offer her as a sacrifice as part of plans for world domination. It's up to four warriors to fight over various levels in pursuit of the Princess and save her and stop the Sheikh's evil plan. The warriors are Sinbat, Goldor, Ramaya and Datta who each have their own fighting style and magic. You can choose to play as one of the warriors with up to three other friends playing along side you.
